data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
select TRH.TrainNo,TrainingCourse,Duration,FromDate,ToDate,TrainingFee,Locations as Training_Center, Purpose,Scopes,TRH.Remark,HRD.Description as Department,RequesterName,RequestDate,HRP.Code as Position_,HRP.Description as Position, TRH.Department as Dept,GETDATE() DateNow_,TRH.Expected,TRH.DirComment,ETS.FromTime,ETS.ToTime,SessDate, --Approved Level 1 (Select top 1 EX.ApproverName from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))ApproverName1, (Select top 1 EX.Status from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Status1, (Select top 1 EX.Comment from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Comment1, (Select top 1 EX.ApprovedDate from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))ApprovedDate1, (select top 1 Code from HRPosition where code in(select JobCode from HRStaffProfile where EmpCode in(select ApprovedBy from TrainingRequestHeader TR INNER JOIN ExDocApproval ED on TR.TrainNo=ED.DocumentNo where ED.DocumentNo= @TrainNo and ED.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))) Position1, --Approved Level 2 (Select top 1 EX.ApproverName from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =2)>0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))ApproverName2, (Select top 1 EX.Status from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =2)>0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))Status2, (Select top 1 EX.Comment from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =2)>0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))Comment2, (Select top 1 EX.ApprovedDate from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =2)>0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))ApprovedDate2, (select top 1 Code from HRPosition where code in(select JobCode from HRStaffProfile where EmpCode in(select ApprovedBy from TrainingRequestHeader TR INNER JOIN ExDocApproval ED on TR.TrainNo=ED.DocumentNo where ED.DocumentNo= @TrainNo and ED.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =2)>0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END)))) Position2, --Approved Level 3 (Select top 1 EX.ApproverName from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =3)>0 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))ApproverName3, (Select top 1 EX.Status from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =3)>0 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))Status3, (Select top 1 EX.Comment from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =3)>0 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))Comment3, (Select top 1 EX.ApprovedDate from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =3)>0 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END))ApprovedDate3, (select top 1 Code from HRPosition where code in(select JobCode from HRStaffProfile where EmpCode in(select ApprovedBy from TrainingRequestHeader TR INNER JOIN ExDocApproval ED on TR.TrainNo=ED.DocumentNo where ED.ApproveLevel IN(Case WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN (CASE WHEN (Select top 1 COUNT (EX.ApproveLevel) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo AND Ex.ApproveLevel =3)>0 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 0 END)))) Position3, (Select COUNT(EX.DocumentNo) from ExDocApproval EX where DocumentNo=TRH.TrainNo)Approve
from TrainingRequestHeader TRH left join HRStaffProfile HRS on HRS.EmpCode=TRH.RequestCode left join HRDepartment HRD on HRD.Code=TRH.Department inner join HRPosition HRP on HRP.Code=HRS.JobCode inner join ESSTrainingSchedule ETS on ETS.TrainNo=TRH.TrainNo where TRH.TrainNo = @TrainNo AND @APROLEVEL=@APROLEVEL and ETS.No=1
